title: DeFi Bounty System
description: No freelance platform exists where a worker can be compensated in ADA for tasks, projects, or on a salary basis.

f6_assessments.q0: Please provide details on what you are actually planning to provide.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem and solution described are reasonable and I see potential impact. Projects like Gitcoin allow open source developers to be remunerated by the community, companies and organizations and are a sustainable and alternative way to secure funding.

However, the proposal is only a draft and there is no detail that allows measuring the potential for impact.

I recommend following the Catalyst documentation to prepare the proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: It's a very interesting idea and one that could be a great Dapp integration for Cardano. Could be the go to application to kick start a good project. More information as to what platform is being created, how is marketed and ways to track the MVP it releases upon funding.
